channel.title: 508 making items only wearable for donators HELP!
channel.description: I've got a donator system up but i dunno how to make it so only donators can wear customs (statius, vesta you catch my drift) Tut or snippet plz :D?

item.title: 508 making items only wearable for donators HELP!
item.dc:creator: @isassi isassi
item.description:
@isassi wrote:

[quote=“DuhPk, post:13, topic:362129”][quote author=isassi link=topic=458418.msg3354506#msg3354506 date=1285671221]

Here try something like this.

[code]if ((wearId == 3101) || (wearId == 1007) || (wearId == 4375) || (wearId == 1121) || (wearId == 13095) || (wearId == 13097) || (wearId == 13099)) {
if ((p.rights < 1) && (p.donator < 1)) {

p.frames.sendMessage(p,“You must become a donator before you can wear this!”);
return;
}
}
[/code]

hope this helps
NOTE: this code is from a bulby based server

Thanks again i add this into Applut_sub1 yeah? just making sure :L
[/quote]

LOL ^[/quote]

quiet you

Read full topic
